title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Blended Mathematics Learning Design Applying the CIDM Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and foundational knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can develop learning plans utilizing at least three components of the 7D Framework in the CIDM model in mobile environments.
Learners can solve statistical reasoning problems with 80% accuracy through profession-specific case-based microlearning modules.
Learners can complete one peer feedback project using digital learning materials based on UDL principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
